title: Geohash in Antigravity Module
shortDescription: The antigravity module includes a geohash function for generating meetup locations!
detailedDescription: Beyond opening the famous xkcd comic, the antigravity module also contains a geohash function that can generate GPS coordinates for meetups. This is based on another xkcd comic about the 'geohashing' algorithm, which creates a deterministic but unpredictable location within a 1° latitude by 1° longitude square based on your location and the date.
examples: # This opens the xkcd comic about Python
# The geohash function (requires latitude, longitude, and date)
# 2. Get the Dow Jones opening for the date
# 3. Use MD5 hash to generate coordinates
# 4. Meet other geohashers at that location!
